abstract: Codecademy, a service that lets people take free online coding classes, is getting a large vote of confidence from the investor community.
snippet: Codecademy, a service that lets people take free online coding classes, is getting a large vote of confidence from the investor community.
lead_paragraph: Codecademy, a Web site that teaches people how to program for free, just got a lift for its lesson plan: $2.5 million in venture financing.
